name: Lost Time
flavorText: The hourglass glows with the essence of several lives that ended too soon.
flavorTextHtml: The hourglass glows with the essence of several lives that ended too soon.

secondary.textHtml: Your cold skills reduce the movement speed of enemies by 30%. In addition, your movement speed is increased by 10% for 5 seconds. Maximum 5 stacks. (Necromancer Only) [8 - 10]%
secondary.text: Your cold skills reduce the movement speed of enemies by 30%. In addition, your movement speed is increased by 10% for 5 seconds.  Maximum 5 stacks. (Necromancer Only) [8 - 10]%
